item.title: Bar Plots, Bar None
item.description: Welcome back to our final installment of ggplot2 data visualization! Today, we are doing bar plots! library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(ggplot2) A bar plot lays out the different levels of an attribute or factor! We will look at the team homerun totals for all the MLB teams in 1980. query<-"SELECT name,HR FROM Teams WHERE yearID=1980 ORDER BY HR " result<-sqldf(query) result$name<-factor(result$name,levels=result$name) The last line is saving the information as a factor, and letting the system know that the order the results appear in the order we specified, not default alphabetical.
